Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.SensorHelpers

Class NeutralModeWrapper

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.SensorHelpers.NeutralModeWrapper
public class NeutralModeWrapper extends Object
A wrapper class for managing the neutral or disabled state of a motor controller bridge. This class provides a way to represent and convert motor controller states between different enums, such as `NeutralModeValue` and `IdleMode`.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    NeutralModeWrapper.disabledMode
    Enum representing the possible disabled or neutral states of the motor controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • NeutralModeWrapper

      public NeutralModeWrapper(NeutralModeValue mode2)
      Constructor to initialize the neutral mode using a `NeutralModeValue`.
      Parameters:
      mode2 - The neutral mode value to set the motor controller to. It can be either `NeutralModeValue.Brake` or `NeutralModeValue.Coast`.

    • NeutralModeWrapper

      public NeutralModeWrapper(SparkBaseConfig.IdleMode value)
      Constructor to initialize the neutral mode using an `IdleMode` value from the Spark motor controller.
      Parameters:
      value - The idle mode value to set the motor controller to. It can be either `IdleMode.kBrake` or `IdleMode.kCoast`.

    • NeutralModeWrapper

      public NeutralModeWrapper(NeutralModeWrapper.disabledMode value)
      Constructor to initialize the neutral mode directly using a `disabledMode` enum value.
      Parameters:
      value - The `disabledMode` value to set the motor controller to. It can be `Coast`, `Brake`, or `None`.

  • Method Details

    • asIdleMode

      public SparkBaseConfig.IdleMode asIdleMode()
      Converts the current state of the motor controller to the corresponding `IdleMode` for Spark motor controllers.
      Returns:
      The `IdleMode` representing the current neutral or disabled state of the motor controller. Returns `IdleMode.kBrake` if the state is `Brake`, otherwise returns `IdleMode.kCoast`.

    • asNeutralModeValue

      public NeutralModeValue asNeutralModeValue()
      Converts the current state of the motor controller to the corresponding `NeutralModeValue`.
      Returns:
      The `NeutralModeValue` representing the current neutral or disabled state of the motor controller. Returns `NeutralModeValue.Brake` if the state is `Brake`, otherwise returns `NeutralModeValue.Coast`.
